subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Ravens’ offense, once an easy target of criticism, has become both efficient and explosive, ranking 10th in the N.F.L. in yards per game since Coach Brian Billick took over the play-calling in mid-October.
snippet: The Ravens’ offense, once an easy target of criticism, has become both efficient and explosive, ranking 10th in the N.F.L. in yards per game since Coach Brian Billick took over the play-calling in mid-October.
